sn22.102:1.2: “Aniccasanna, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata sabbam kamaragam pariyadiyati, sabbam ruparagam pariyadiyati, sabbam bhavaragam pariyadiyati, sabbam avijjam pariyadiyati, sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye kassako mahanangalena kasanto sabbani mulasantanakani sampadalento kasati;
sn22.102:2.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna bhavita bahulikata sabbam kamaragam pariyadiyati, sabbam ruparagam pariyadiyati, sabbam bhavaragam pariyadiyati, sabbam avijjam pariyadiyati, sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, pabbajalayako pabbajam layitva agge gahetva odhunati niddhunati nicchoteti;
sn22.102:3.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna bhavita bahulikata sabbam kamaragam pariyadiyati …pe… sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ambapindiya vantacchinnaya yani tattha ambani vantapatibandhani sabbani tani tadanvayani bhavanti;
sn22.102:4.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna bhavita …pe… sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kutagarassa ya kaci gopanasiyo sabba ta kutangama kutaninna kutasamosarana, kutam tasam aggamakkhayati;
sn22.102:5.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna bhavita …pe… sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:6.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci mulagandha kalanusarigandho tesam aggamakkhayati;
sn22.102:6.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna …pe… sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:7.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci saragandha, lohitacandanam tesam aggamakkhayati;
sn22.102:7.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna …pe… sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:8.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci pupphagandha, vassikam tesam aggamakkhayati;
sn22.102:8.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna …pe… sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:9.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci kuttarajano, sabbete ranno cakkavattissa anuyanta bhavanti, raja tesam cakkavatti aggamakkhayati;
sn22.102:9.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna …pe… sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:10.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ya kaci tarakarupanam pabha, sabba ta candimappabhaya kalam nagghanti solasim, candappabha tasam aggamakkhayati;
sn22.102:10.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna …pe… sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:11.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalahake deve adicco natam abbhussakkamano, sabbam akasagatam tamagatam abhivihacca bhasate ca tapate ca virocate ca;
sn22.102:11.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna bhavita bahulikata sabbam kamaragam pariyadiyati, sabbam ruparagam pariyadiyati, sabbam bhavaragam pariyadiyati, sabbam avijjam pariyadiyati, sabbam asmimanam samuhanati.
sn22.102:12.1: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, aniccasanna katham bahulikata sabbam kamaragam pariyadiyati …pe… sabbam asmimanam samuhanati?
sn22.102:12.2: ‘Iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
sn22.102:12.6: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti—
sn22.102:12.7: evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, aniccasanna evam bahulikata sabbam kamaragam pariyadiyati, sabbam ruparagam pariyadiyati, sabbam bhavaragam pariyadiyati, sabbam avijjam pariyadiyati, sabbam asmimanam samuhanati”ti.
